body: Ahhhh damn Mizuga still going strong I see, this was better than the usual, 9/10 for art style and 8/10 for plot, the dedication of this good sir is insane.

@HolyshititsTAKA Can you even draw to begin with? Actually, do you even know anything about drawing? It seems like you don't. Mizuga is relatively new, they are still developing and improving their art, and still it's pretty damn good. 

Also they are putting a lot of effort into this, they even say they will devote themselves to make better, more varied facial expressions which for me it's their strongest point. But anyways, checking out your profile I can see you don't have much of a taste.
It doesn't get me hard but its cute so fav
Lol @Taka do you see the shit you've favourited? The art in those works are complete shit compared to this. Just shows that you have shit taste.

Mizuga- "Damn it! My works still don't seem to come out right... Should I even release this?" 
Friend- "Of course! You have worked on it for so long, and it is a touhou manga, so poor drawing skills are expected. No one will even notice."
Mizuga- "You know what? You are right! I will go ahead and release it!!!"

TAKA- "This art is kind of shitty."
Well if you read Mizuga's other works,  Ran kinda has been sleeping around lol
only fell asleep? the face she made was dead face, kakou the blyat!!!
I see, thanks. I thought she meant sleeping around with them
she made a loli cry she is fuckin done.
She means she was spending time with other animals. That's why she got jelous.
I dont get it, what does she mean smelling like other animals?
Is it just me or does her penis disappear in some panels? Seems like Voodoo.
